alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 12:09PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A period of mixed light snow and light freezing rain is expected late afternoon into early this evening. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. After 10 pm tonight and into Tuesday morning look for strong west to northwest winds gusting over 55 mph creating reduced visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
